sledgehammer.lua

Class LuaObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.lua.LuaObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LuaArray, LuaTable

    public abstract class LuaObject
extends Printable
    An abstract utility Class that allows proper organization and export of KahluaTables for complex data structures.
    Author:
    Jab

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the String name of the LuaObject. This is shown as '__name' in the exported KahluaTable.
        Parameters:
        name - The String name to set.

      • export

        public abstract se.krka.kahlua.vm.KahluaTable export()
        Returns:
        Returns an exported version of a LuaObject formatted as a KahluaTable.

      • processValue

        public static java.lang.Object processValue(java.lang.Object value)
        Validates an Object value for KahLua.
        Parameters:
        value - The Object value to validate.
        Returns:
        Returns the validated Object.

      • toLuaNumber

        public static java.lang.Number toLuaNumber(java.lang.Number number)
        Formats a given Number to a double, as Lua requires all values to be doubles.
        Parameters:
        number - The Number being formatted for Lua.
        Returns:
        Returns a Double value as a Number.

      • newTable

        public static se.krka.kahlua.vm.KahluaTable newTable()
        Returns:
        Returns a new KahluaTable instance, generated by the J2SEPlatform instance for KahLua in the ProjectZomboid LuaManager.
